text:
All right so today we're gonna have a ton 
of fun learning English with these funny

cute little creatures called Minions 
and in case you don't know the movie

it also stars the voice of 
Oscar-winning actress Sandra Bullock

But quickly before we jump into all that fun 
I wanted to let you know that if you are new

here every single week we make lessons like 
this with your favorite movies, series and so

much more so that you can understand fast speaking 
natives without getting lost, without missing the

jokes and without subtitles. Just like our fan 
Nicole who says that not only is she improving

her english but she's also having fun and laughing 
with all the jokes and you will too so definitely

hit that subscribe button and the bell below and 
you won't miss a single one of our new lessons!

By the way do you want to be able to 
understand the expressions that we

natives use in our everyday speech well? 
I have a great and fun way for you to do

it with our Fluent with Friends Course. Now you 
will learn the vocabulary that you really need,

you will improve your pronunciation and 
you will be able to laugh with all of the

jokes.So what are you waiting for? You can try it 
absolutely free with our three-part Masterclass

and you can learn more and sign up for that by 
clicking up here or down in the description below!

And if you are digging this lesson then I 
know you're going to absolutely love this

one that we made recently with Despicable 
Me! And the great thing is that you'll also

learn some English that will help you with giving 
presentations! So if you want to watch that then

after you've finished this lesson you can simply 
click up here or down the description below!
